class.name: MeshLibrary
class.description: A library of meshes. Contains a list of [Mesh] resources, each with a name and ID. Each item can also include collision and navigation shapes. This resource is used in [GridMap].

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears the library.

method.name: create_item
method.description: Creates a new item in the library with the given ID. You can get an unused ID from [method get_last_unused_item_id].

method.name: find_item_by_name
method.description: Returns the first item with the given name, or [code]-1[/code] if no item is found.

method.name: get_item_list
method.description: Returns the list of item IDs in use.

method.name: get_item_mesh
method.description: Returns the item's mesh.

method.name: get_item_mesh_cast_shadow
method.description: Returns the item's shadow casting mode. See [enum RenderingServer.ShadowCastingSetting] for possible values.

method.name: get_item_mesh_transform
method.description: Returns the transform applied to the item's mesh.

method.name: get_item_name
method.description: Returns the item's name.

method.name: get_item_navigation_layers
method.description: Returns the item's navigation layers bitmask.

method.name: get_item_navigation_mesh
method.description: Returns the item's navigation mesh.

method.name: get_item_navigation_mesh_transform
method.description: Returns the transform applied to the item's navigation mesh.

method.name: get_item_preview
method.description: When running in the editor, returns a generated item preview (a 3D rendering in isometric perspective). When used in a running project, returns the manually-defined item preview which can be set using [method set_item_preview]. Returns an empty [Texture2D] if no preview was manually set in a running project.

method.name: get_item_shapes
method.description: Returns an item's collision shapes. The array consists of each [Shape3D] followed by its [Transform3D].

method.name: get_last_unused_item_id
method.description: Gets an unused ID for a new item.

method.name: remove_item
method.description: Removes the item.

method.name: set_item_mesh
method.description: Sets the item's mesh.

method.name: set_item_mesh_cast_shadow
method.description: Sets the item's shadow casting mode. See [enum RenderingServer.ShadowCastingSetting] for possible values.

method.name: set_item_mesh_transform
method.description: Sets the transform to apply to the item's mesh.

method.name: set_item_name
method.description: Sets the item's name. This name is shown in the editor. It can also be used to look up the item later using [method find_item_by_name].

method.name: set_item_navigation_layers
method.description: Sets the item's navigation layers bitmask.

method.name: set_item_navigation_mesh
method.description: Sets the item's navigation mesh.

method.name: set_item_navigation_mesh_transform
method.description: Sets the transform to apply to the item's navigation mesh.

method.name: set_item_preview
method.description: Sets a texture to use as the item's preview icon in the editor.

method.name: set_item_shapes
method.description: Sets an item's collision shapes. The array should consist of [Shape3D] objects, each followed by a [Transform3D] that will be applied to it. For shapes that should not have a transform, use [constant Transform3D.IDENTITY].
